Growth Accelerator Maching

I help sales teams create more opportunities and revenue

My passion is sales — it’s what I’ve been doing my whole life, and it’s what I still love today. From a top performing sales rep, to managing large sales teams and running a 220 person sales organization, I’ve helped increase revenue across multiple industries and countries.

View My LinkedIn Profile to Learn More

Currently, I’m the co-founder and CEO of CloudTask, a managed workforce provider for growing companies looking to increase their sales, customer retention and revenue, through trained and managed teams of sales and customer success experts.

Learn More About CloudTask

Work With Me

I offer Consulting Services for CEOs, Sales Leaders and anyone interested in growing their revenue. Here’s what you will obtain:

  • - Clear sales strategies and direction
  • - Proven guidelines for maximum efficiency
  • - Help to build and grow your sales team
  • - Effective tactics to optimize your product and service offerings
